description: A collection of demonstration functions for illustrating physics concepts including relativistic mass, force-acceleration ratio, and data visualization; each function is designed to showcase core physical principles through computational examples.

function.name: demo_relativistic_mass
function.description: Demonstrates the calculation of relativistic mass as a function of velocity, illustrating how mass increases with speed according to special relativity.

result.description: 返回相对论质量计算的结果

relativistic_mass.description: 物体的相对论质量（单位：kg）

function.name: demo_force_acceleration_ratio
function.description: Demonstrates the ratio between applied force and resulting acceleration, highlighting inertial behavior and potential relativistic or non-ideal effects.

result.description: 返回力与加速度比值的计算结果

ratio.description: 力与加速度的比值（理论上等于质量）

function.name: demo_visualization
function.description: Demonstrates data visualization techniques for physical quantities, such as plotting relativistic mass or force-acceleration relationships over a range of values.

result.description: 返回可视化演示的相关信息

data_points.description: 用于可视化的数据点列表

plot_type.description: 图表类型（如 line, scatter, bar 等）
